analysis.summary: The wiki consists of 13 markdown files organized into three top‑level directories (projects, guide, bun). Most files follow the naming convention, but there are several duplicate/overlapping documents and many placeholder pages that need attention. Tag syntax and status values are inconsistent, and a few documents are drafts or have an unknown status.
issues: Duplicate content: `guide/diagrams-and-charts.md` and `guide/diagrams-guide.md` cover the same topic.
Many placeholder pages (theme‑customization, getting‑started, diagrams‑guide, llm‑workflow, configuration‑guide) contain only a short stub.
Tag fields are not uniform – some are JSON arrays, others are plain strings.
No `home.md` at the repository root (required by the guidelines).
